message: My wife does this for me already

Hey Psytek, good effort for sure.. I haven't tried it but I think you are going to run into a branding problem.. no one wants to be nagged.. maybe reminded.. or encouraged.. or something... Also.. why would I use this when I can just get my friend to remind me?
I like the idea, lots of people I know have issue keeping on task, and get sick of hearing it from friends and family... this might give them a boast
